Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Gender Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select D.ID, COALESCE(GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID, COALESCE(SCORECARD_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SCORECARD_ID, CP13.DESIGNATION, CP13.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_COUNT, COALESCE(D.HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_DIM, COALESCE(cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP13SCORECARD_AREA_SCORE D JOIN CP13GENDER_PROFILE CP13 ON CP13.ID = D.PARENT_ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON CP13.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP13.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP13.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP13.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP13.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID ON D.GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID=GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SCORECARD_ID ON D.SCORECARD_ID=SCORECARD_ID.ID WHERE CP13.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP13.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

SELECT S.ID, S.PARENT_ID, COALESCE(SCORECARD_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SCORECARD_ID, COALESCE(GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID, CP13.DESIGNATION, CP13.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP13UNSWAP_SCORECARD_AREA_SCORE S JOIN CP13GENDER_PROFILE CP13 ON S.PARENT_ID = CP13.ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON CP13.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP13.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP13.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP13.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP13.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SCORECARD_ID ON S.SCORECARD_ID=SCORECARD_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID ON S.GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID=GENDER_EQUALITY_RATING_ID.ID WHERE CP13.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP13.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

select cp13.ID, cp13.DESIGNATION, cp13.ENTITY_YEAR, cp13.YEAR_CONDUCTED_GENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD, COALESCE(GENDER_SCORECARD_TYPES_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as GENDER_SCORECARD_TYPES_ID, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp13.HASUNCTGENDER_ADVISOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTGENDER_ADVISOR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.HASUNCTGENDER_ADVISOR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTGENDER_ADVISOR, CASE WHEN cp13.HASUNDAFSPECIFIC_GENDER_RESULTS_OUTCOME_LEVEL = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNDAFSPECIFIC_GENDER_RESULTS_OUTCOME_LEVEL_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.HASUNDAFSPECIFIC_GENDER_RESULTS_OUTCOME_LEVEL, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNDAFSPECIFIC_GENDER_RESULTS_OUTCOME_LEVEL, CASE WHEN cp13.HASUNCTGENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTGENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.HASUNCTGENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTGENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD, CASE WHEN cp13.HAS_CAPACITY_BUILDINGUNSTAFF_GENDER = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_CAPACITY_BUILDINGUNSTAFF_GENDER_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.HAS_CAPACITY_BUILDINGUNSTAFF_GENDER, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_CAPACITY_BUILDINGUNSTAFF_GENDER, CASE WHEN cp13.UNCT_USES_GENDER_EQUALITY_MARKER = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UNCT_USES_GENDER_EQUALITY_MARKER_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.UNCT_USES_GENDER_EQUALITY_MARKER, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UNCT_USES_GENDER_EQUALITY_MARKER, CASE WHEN cp13.GENDER_MAINSTREAMING_STRATEGY_IN_PLACE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as GENDER_MAINSTREAMING_STRATEGY_IN_PLACE_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.GENDER_MAINSTREAMING_STRATEGY_IN_PLACE, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS GENDER_MAINSTREAMING_STRATEGY_IN_PLACE, COALESCE(cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN cp13.HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_COUNT, COALESCE(cp13.HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_DIM, CASE WHEN cp13.was_management_response_used = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as was_management_response_used_count, COALESCE(cp13.was_management_response_used, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS was_management_response_used_dim, CASE WHEN cp13.has_gender_parity = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_gender_parity_count, COALESCE(cp13.has_gender_parity, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_gender_parity_dim, CASE WHEN cp13.has_working_environment_for_gender_parity = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_working_environment_for_gender_parity_count, COALESCE(cp13.has_working_environment_for_gender_parity, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_working_environment_for_gender_parity_dim from CP13GENDER_PROFILE cp13 JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1 ON cp13.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp13.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON cp13.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON cp13.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp13.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY GENDER_SCORECARD_TYPES_ID ON cp13.GENDER_SCORECARD_TYPES_ID=GENDER_SCORECARD_TYPES_ID.ID WHERE cp13.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp13.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

Dimension.name: HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_DIM
Dimension.caption: Has UNCT addressed the scorecard recommendations?

Measure.name: hasUNCTDevelopedManagementPlan
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT developed a management response to the Scorecard/action plan to address the proposed actions?'

Dimension.name: HASUNCTGENDER_ADVISOR
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have dedicated capacity to support the UNCT's work on gender equality and the empowerment of women?

Dimension.name: HASUNDAFSPECIFIC_GENDER_RESULTS_OUTCOME_LEVEL
Dimension.caption: If you have an UNDAF/Cooperation Framework (or equivalent), does it have specific gender results at the outcome level?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTGENDER_EQUALITY_SCORECARD
Dimension.caption: Has your UNCT implemented the UNCT SWAP Scorecard (New scorecard) in the past FOUR years?

Dimension.name: HAS_CAPACITY_BUILDINGUNSTAFF_GENDER
Dimension.caption: Has there been any capacity building for UN staff on the issue of gender mainstreaming in the past year?

Dimension.name: UNCT_USES_GENDER_EQUALITY_MARKER
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT use a gender equality marker?

Dimension.name: Year when Gender Equality Scorecard was Conducted
Dimension.caption: Year when Gender Equality Scorecard was Conducted

Attribute.name: Year when Gender Equality Scorecard was Conducted

Dimension.name: GENDER_MAINSTREAMING_STRATEGY_IN_PLACE
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a gender mainstreaming strategy in place?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTDEVELOPED_MANAGEMENT_PLAN_DIM
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT developed a management response to the Scorecard/action plan to address the proposed actions?

Dimension.name: was_management_response_used_dim
Dimension.caption: Has the management response/action plan been used in the UNDAF/Cooperation Framework process as a resource document?

Dimension.name: has_gender_parity_dim
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT undertaken any UNCT-wide actions to enhance gender parity in the recruitment, retention, progression and talent management of staff in the UNCT in the past year?

Dimension.name: has_working_environment_for_gender_parity_dim
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT undertaken any UNCT-wide actions to build an enabling working environment for gender parity (an environment that prizes diversity and flexibility, provides equal opportunities, recognizes that staff are also family and community members, and ensures a safe environment) in the past year?

Measure.name: UNCTGenderAdvisor
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have dedicated capacity to support the UNCT's work on gender equality and the empowerment of women?'

Measure.name: UNDAFSpecificGenderResults
Measure.caption: Count of 'If you have an UNDAF/Cooperation Framework (or equivalent), does it have specific gender results at the outcome level?'

Measure.name: GenderEqualityScorecard
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has your UNCT implemented the UNCT SWAP Scorecard (New scorecard) in the past FOUR years?'

Measure.name: CapacityBuildingUNStaff
Measure.caption: Count of capacity building for UN staff on the issue of gender mainstreaming in the past year

Measure.name: UNCTThatUseGenderEquality
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT that use a gender equality marker

Measure.name: GenderMainstreamingStrategyInPlace
Measure.caption: Count of Gender Mainstreaming Strategies In Place

Measure.name: hasUNCTDevelopedManagementPlanCount
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT that developed a management response/action plan to address the recommendations

Measure.name: wasManagementResponseUsed
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the management response/action plan been used in the UNDAF/Cooperation Framework process as a resource document?'

Measure.name: hasGenderParity
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT undertaken any UNCT-wide actions to enhance gender parity in the recruitment, retention, progression and talent management of staff in the UNCT in the past year?'

Measure.name: hasWorkingEnvironmentForGenderParity
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT undertaken any UNCT-wide actions to build an enabling working environment for gender parity (an environment that prizes diversity and flexibility, provides equal opportunities, recognizes that staff are also family and community members, and ensures a safe environment) in the past year?'

FactLink.dimension: Year when Gender Equality Scorecard was Conducted
